channel.title: Unsellable 718

item.title: Unsellable 718
item.dc:creator: @kenvanbael kenvanbael
item.description:
@kenvanbael wrote:

how i make items like chaotics, primal, cele,
unsellable to the shop again,
i really don’t like ask help, i really like to find it on my own
but this i can’t find,
i added the shop, npc’s that drop tokens/dung exp
i added to shop.java;

public boolean isSellable(int id) {
	int[] nosell = {18349, 18351, 18355, 18357, 18359, 18361, 18363, 20824, 20822, 20823, 20826, 20825, 
			16909, 16955, 17039, 17143, 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048, 1050, 16755, 17237, 16865,
			16931, 17171};
	for (int j: nosell){
		if (j != id){
			continue;
		}else if (j == id){
		return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}

but it doesnt work ;s
can any1 help my how i make these items in my dung shop unsellable
people can buy it but they can sell it back for the same tokens

Read full topic
